dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement 21/Abril/2005
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 21, 2005 9:41 PM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement 21/Abril/2005]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
From: - Thu Apr 21 21:36:18 2005
X-Mozilla-Status: 0001
X-Mozilla-Status2: 00000000
Received: from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim 4.50)        id
1DOlhR-000203-Qm        for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Thu, 21 Apr 2005
19:07:13 -0500
Received: from spooling.theplanet.com ([69.56.141.4]
helo=lili.theplanet.com)        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)        with smtp (Exim)        id
1DOlhK-0009Li-JN
for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Thu, 21 Apr 2005 19:07:13 -0500
Received: (qmail 16411 invoked from network); 21 Apr 2005 23:45:18 -0000
Received: from unknown (HELO ?216.185.111.52?) (172.16.214.110)  by
lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 21 Apr 2005 23:45:18 -0000
Received: from [172.16.214.181] (helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50)        id
1DOlMC-0000OV-6f        for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 21 Apr 2005 18:45:16
-0500
Received: from [64.62.176.24] (helo=london.netmongol.com)        by
mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from nopiracy@miportal.es)        with
esmtp (Exim) id 1DOlM0-0000VH-S0        for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 21 Apr
2005 18:45:15 -0500
Received: from miportal.es (london.netmongol.com [66.220.30.22])        by
london.netmongol.com (Postfix) with SMTP id 3D4B7AF4BE        for
<abuse@theplanet.com>; Thu, 21 Apr 2005 17:36:39 -0600 (MDT)
Received: from 207.248.240.119        (WWWebmail authenticated user
nopiracy@miportal.es)        by webmail.netmongol.com with HTTP;        Fri, 22 Apr
2005 01:36:39 +0200 (CEST)
Message-ID:
<40597.207.248.240.119.1114126599.squirrel@webmail.netmongol.com>
Date: Fri, 22 Apr 2005 01:36:39 +0200 (CEST)
From: <nopiracy@miportal.es>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
X-Priority: 3
Importance: Normal
X-MSMail-Priority: Normal
X-Mailer: WWWebmail (version 1.2.7)
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit
Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 64.62.176.24 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of miportal.es)        client-ip=64.62.176.24;
envelope-from=nopiracy@miportal.es;        helo=london.netmongol.com;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.7
Cc:
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement  21/Abril/2005
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.7

To whom it may concern:

We have received different reports concerning the following people and
direct ip involved.

We have spotted and monitored Copyright Infringement activities at the
following ip address 70.85.0.132 => 132.70-85-0.reverse.theplanet.com such
ip belongs to Theplanet.com their FTP is connected in a ring with other
servers providing different copyright material such as DVD's, PC Games, PC
Applications, X-BOX games, etc.

Their server is running on port 51512

They sell copies without proper authorization their email is
info@megabitsoft.com with the following web page www.megabitsoft.com one of
their nicknames is Chapulin know for his real name Joan Manson currently
lives in Venezuela, Caracas.

Please we ask you to look into this matter and resolve this in the proper
and correct manner.

We are open to any other suggestions. If you wish we may as well report this
to your local government and ant piracy organizations based in the US.
If you require any assist you may contact us at any time replying to this
email.

Thank you for your time.

nopiracy@miportal.es
European Based Organization
fighting against on line criminals.
Espa
